title: Jigsaw Puzzle Piece
description:
A single piece of a jigsaw puzzle, shown with two tabs and two blanks.

Usually shown as a plain green puzzle piece, though color and imagery does vary.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the puzzle piece emoji is rendered with a vibrant blue hue, exhibiting Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges.  Its interlocking tab and notch are precisely defined, showcasing realistic lighting that gives it a tangible, almost three-dimensional feel.  This emoji on Apple devices perfectly captures the essence of connection, problem-solving, and the feeling of something fitting perfectly into place.
